comments.body: The `carrier` package requires using named arguments to specify data used by the crated function - see https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/carrier/carrier.pdf and cmd+f for "named arguments"

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@  mlflow_clear_test_dir("model")
  model <- lm(Sepal.Width ~ Sepal.Length, iris)
  fn <- crate(~ stats::predict(model, .x), model = model)
  mlflow_save_model(fn, "model")
  expect_true(dir.exists("model"))
